entry.title: iPad Pro 11 (1st & 2nd Gen) - Anti-Blue Light Tempered Glass Screen Patrol
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Screen Patrol Tablet
Price: 15.99

  • Screen Patrol Tempered glass protector is specifically designed for the Apple iPad Pro 11-inch (1st & 2nd Generation) : Model (A2228/A2068/A2230/2231/A1980/A1934/A2013/A1979)
  • Case friendly and is Apple Pencil Compatible.
  • Anti-blue light tempered glass blocks harmful blue light from your screens which can cause insomnia, eye strain, headaches, dry eyes and blurry vision, with children and teenagers particularly at risk
  • Anti Blue Light Technology protects your eyes and sleep, but still allows non-harmful light through the full color crystal clear screen
  • It is a 9h Hardness glass so it will protect you screen glass if it drops accidentally Feels Smooth Sensitive to Touch
  • Fingerprint and Smudge Resistance Only 0.3mm thick, and it maintains high touch sensitivity.
  • It is a case friendly glass so you can use it with your favorite branded cases

entry.title: iPad Pro 12.9 (3rd Gen) - Screen Patrol - Tempered Glass
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Screen Patrol Tablet
Price: 12.99

  • Screen Patrol Tempered glass protector is specifically designed for the Apple iPad Pro 12.9 Inch (3rd Generation): Model (A1876/A1895/A2014/A1983)
  • Case friendly and is Apple Pencil Compatible.
  • Ultra thin transparent screen featuring 9H screen hardness.
  • Tempered glass is made of HD crystal clear screen that is anti fingerprint and scratch resistant.
  • Provides super sensitive response to touch with barely-there thickness of 0.33 mm
  • Experience easy bubble-free screen installation
